attributes.action: end legislation allowing anonymity for youth offenders convicted of sex crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming more and more prolific for youths to commit horrendous sexual crimes against young girls.  They currently do so safe in the knowledge that no matter how lenient or severe their sentence, their identity will most likely never be made public.  This is wrong.  Their identity should never be withheld and the current legislation allowing it must be withdrawn
